title: PostPilot
description:
PostPilot is a social media automation AI tool designed to streamline content creation for small businesses and start-ups. Our primary goal is to save you time on content creation, allowing you to focus on "do something great" in your industry.  

Setting up automated content creation with PostPilot is as simple as three steps:  

1. Choose from unlimited templates for your social media needs.  
2. Describe the type of content you want.  
3. Set the posting schedule.
